content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia. While discussing the rental price for this modern apartment in the heart of Magdeburg, let me start with a slightly higher figure than expected - say 1050 Euros per month. However, I am open to negotiation and finding common ground.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is quite expensive, I have to admit. I would be more comfortable with 890 euros per month. I understand that the apartment is in a great location and is newly built, but I am a student and I have to consider my budget.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I recognize your situation, Emilia, but as a landlord, I need to protect my investment and ensure a reasonable return. At present, I cannot agree to lower the price to 890 Euros. Perhaps we can find a middle ground. How about considering 990 Euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to find a middle ground. However, 990 euros is still a bit high for me. I would be willing to pay 940 euros per month. I am a dependable tenant and I always pay my rent on time.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, I understand your commitment to timely payments, but with a smaller margin, it becomes challenging to meet my own financial obligations. Unfortunately, I cannot accept 940 Euros as the rental price. If you increase your offer to 975 Euros, I might give it some consideration.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my offer. I understand your financial obligations. However, I still cannot afford 975 euros per month. I am willing to pay 950 euros per month. I am a responsible and trustworthy tenant who always pays the rent on time.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: While your offer of 950 Euros is closer to a mutually acceptable price, it still falls short of what I was anticipating. Unfortunately, I have to decline your proposal, Emilia. I appreciate your interest in the apartment and wish you the best in your search for a suitable accommodation. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
